definitions.definition: The act of transmitting , e.g. data (signals) or electric power.
Something that is transmitted, such as a message , picture , or a disease ; the sending of such a thing.
The passage of a nerve impulse across synapses .
A device , usually an assembly of gears ( gearbox ) plus a clutch or torque converter , through which power is sent from the engine to the driveshaft in an automobile ( motor car or motor truck ).
examples: Any vehicle with an internal combustion engine needs a transmission that can alter the gear ratio (engine RPM to wheel RPM) as the vehicle's speed changes.

definitions.definition: The right possessed by an heir or legatee of transmitting to his successor (s) any inheritance , legacy , right, or privilege , to which he is entitled, even if he should die without enjoying or exercising it.
The passing of a pathogen or communicable disease from an infected host individual or group to a conspecific individual or group.

main_definition: The act of transmitting , e.g. data (signals) or electric power.
secondary_definitions: Something that is transmitted, such as a message , picture , or a disease ; the sending of such a thing.
( biology ) The passage of a nerve impulse across synapses .

( automotive , trucking , heavy equipment ) A device , usually an assembly of gears ( gearbox ) plus a clutch or torque converter , through which power is sent from the engine to the driveshaft in an automobile ( motor car or motor truck ).

( law ) The right possessed by an heir or legatee of transmitting to his successor (s) any inheritance , legacy , right, or privilege , to which he is entitled, even if he should die without enjoying or exercising it.
( medicine, biology ) The passing of a pathogen or communicable disease from an infected host individual or group to a conspecific individual or group.
